hudson.tasks.Shell.command: npm install bower install --force --production grunt build grunt staging

org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
backupname=`date +"%H-%M_%Y-%m-%d"`
mkdir /home/xima-root/backups/${backupname} && cp -a /var/www/html/htdocs/shared /home/xima-root/backups/${backupname}/
mysqldump --add-drop-database --opt --lock-all-tables -uroot -p/master_ -h localhost -P 3306 typo3_skd | gzip > /home/xima-root/backups/${backupname}/typo3_skd.sql.gz
cd /home/xima-root/backups/ && ls -t | tail -n -1 | xargs rm -rf
